name: GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. Raymond PETTY, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. Raymond PETTY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 1997, the appeal is dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Phillip D. Priore, David M. McCormick, Philadelphia, for Government Employees Insurance Co. ¡
Allen L. Feingold, Philadelphia, for Raymond Petty.
casebody.head_matter:
690 A.2d 235
GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. Raymond PETTY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1997.
Decided March 25, 1997.
Phillip D. Priore, David M. McCormick, Philadelphia, for Government Employees Insurance Co. ¡
Allen L. Feingold, Philadelphia, for Raymond Petty.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
